title: Mycelium
description: Accounts > Select account > Select Export from Menu > Show Public

title: Copay.io
description: Settings > Advanced > Wallet Information > EXTENDED PUBLIC KEYS

title: Ledger
description: Chrome Extension > Select Account > Account Settings > Extended public key > Export

title: Airbitz
description: Transactions screen > 3 dots > Export > Wallet Public Seed (XPub) > View or Save

title: Bitcoin Wallet (Android)
description: 3 dots > Settings > Diagnostics > Show xpub > Share to clipboard, email
